Radiation source.description: The anode material used for the source of radiation

Radiation wavelength.description: The wavelength of radiation in Angstrom or nanometer

Voltage.description: Acceleration voltage of the X-ray tube

Current.description: Electric current of the X-ray tube

Step size.description: The angular interval between consecutive measurement points during a scan

Step mode.description: The scanning technique where the instrument collects diffraction data at discrete angles, usually in small increments

Start position.description: The maximum spectral range of a diffractogram

End position.description: The minimum spectral range of a diffractogram
